seascape models

We are marine scientists who use quantitative tools to inform ocean conservation.


Welcome to the page of the Seascape Models group at Griffith University, led by Dr Chris Brown. We bring ecological complexity to planning tools used to inform decisions.

PhD projects on marine conservation and ecosystem modelling available

our research

Ecosystem conservation, fisheries, climate change and modelling
